gravitate.services.event_service module¶

class gravitate.services.event_service.EventService[source]¶

Bases: flask_restful.Resource

This class allows user to create an event.

methods = {'POST'}¶
post(uid)[source]¶

TODO: implement

This method allows the user to post an event.
Expect a JSON form in request.json

For now, handle only local time in “America/Los_Angeles”

Form fields required:
“eventCategory”: “campus” | “social” “eventLocation” (A user-defined text description such as “LAX”) “locationRef” (Should have been generated by earlier steps in workflow) “startLocalTime” “endLocalTime” “pricing”: 100
Validation:
Reject if:
eventCategory is “airport”, or is not one of “campus”, “social” locationRef is the same as any airport locationRef …

Allow pricing to be empty, and fill in default value

Parameters:uid –
Returns:

gravitate.services.grouping_service module¶

class gravitate.services.grouping_service.OrbitForceMatchService[source]¶

Bases: flask_restful.Resource

This class provides service layer functionality for force matching rideRequests.
This service should be used in development environment to force a match for testing purposes.

gravitate.services.location_service module¶

class gravitate.services.location_service.LocationService[source]¶

Bases: flask_restful.Resource

This class allows user to create an event.

methods = {'POST'}¶
post(uid)[source]¶

TODO: implement

This method allows the user to post a location.
Expect a JSON form in request.json
Form fields required (Note that field names are different from location model):

“category”: “campus”, “coordinates”: {

“latitude”: 34.414132, “longitude”: -119.848868

}, “address”: “C572+HC Isla Vista, California”, “name”: “University of California, Santa Barbara”

Validation:
Reject if:
eventCategory is “airport”, or is not one of “campus”, “social” locationRef is the same as any airport locationRef …

Allow pricing to be empty, and fill in default value

Workflow:
… Generate campusCode from name
Note that this method is only for generating location of an event. User-specific pick up and drop off
are represented with address string, so there is no need to call this endpoint.
Parameters:uid –
Returns:

This method handles POST request to handle use case “create ride request”

update(uid)[source]¶
Description
Handles client FCM Token refresh
https://firebase.google.com/docs/cloud-messaging/android/client#monitor-token-generation
Note that FCM refresh shall not override the user’s settings for enabling notification
(if specified in requirement).
